alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:27AM CDT until June 18 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 826 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Allen, or 14 miles southwest of Hazlehurst, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Glancy around 840 AM CDT. Hazlehurst and Martinsville around 855 AM CDT. Wesson around 900 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
